name: water-bubble
effect: When this Pokémon is hit by a Fire move, the damage is halved.  When this Pokémon uses a Water move, the power is doubled. This Pokémon cannot be burned, and if it becomes burned, the burn is immediately cured.
short_effect: Halves damage from Fire moves, doubles damage of Water moves, and prevents burns.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the
Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting
a burn.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the
Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting
a burn.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the
Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting
a burn.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the
Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting
a burn.
flavor_text_entries.the-indigo-disk: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves that hit the Pokémon and prevents it from being burned.
